mapper.insert: INSERT uploadFile (file_data, file_name, file_kind, mentoroom_id, file_type) VALUES (#{file_data}, #{file_name}, #{file_kind}, #{mentoroom_id}, #{file_type})
mapper.select: SELECT f.*, m.mento_name FROM uploadFile f LEFT JOIN mentoroom m ON f.mentoroom_id = m.mentoroom_id WHERE f.file_kind = 1
